_OpenTelemetryConfiguration: Reference section showing expected OTEL structure. Specific values (endpoint, auth, service name) are in environment-specific appsettings files. See .github/TELEMETRY_CONFIGURATION_REVIEW.md.
_OTELTemporality: CRITICAL: All environments MUST have OTEL_EXPORTER_OTLP_METRICS_TEMPORALITY_PREFERENCE='delta'. Dynatrace doesn't support 'cumulative' (the SDK default).
_OTELProtocol: REQUIRED: Use OTEL_EXPORTER_OTLP_PROTOCOL='http/protobuf' (not gRPC) for Dynatrace OTLP ingest.
_OTELHTTPVersion: RECOMMENDED: Set OTEL_EXPORTER_OTLP_FORCE_HTTP11=true. Dynatrace OTLP endpoint performs better with HTTP/1.1.
